data.message:
Facebook support groups saved my son's life!!! Thank you for staying free and no cost!!

I have a friend Melanie Moog who needs help just like my son, who needed nureo surgery by an expert. She is from Germany and needs help to come  to the United States and have surgery with my son's  nuerosurgeon. Please share this video, you can help by sharing and Facebook is the best way, thank you!!
Please share if you care, and donate if possible to save Melanies life.

https://www.youcaring.com/medical-fundraiser/help-to-save-melanie-s-life-with-a-rare-surgery-in-the-usa/319946

replies.message: Thank you for sharing your touching story, Dori. We’re always looking to feature great stories like yours at Facebook Stories. If interested, you can submit your story at http://www.facebookstories.com/yourstory. :) -Lauren

Thank you Facebook...for being my lifeline out of isolation, during my journey from 2009 to
Present... diagnosed with Leukemia AML...for 6 months my life went from being around thousands of people everyday and helping others to a very small room in a hospital 30 days of near total isolation then 5 more months of limited visitors...2011 I relapsed...and needed a bone marrow transplant...another year of near total isolation...recovering from near death treatments...because Facebook exists  I was able to stay connected to well wishers and their prayers....and I also use my page to help and inform others...Facebook is an AWESOME tool when used for the good of all...again...thank you for all you do....❤❤❤
I want to download facebook apps and install it on my android phone but i dont know how! My play store app is not working, can you help me?
LAUREN, I filled out the link telling our story, can you confirm you got it?
I submitted my son's story...where can I find it?
